carousel.title: Inovartyvūs IT sprendimai Jūsų verslui
carousel.description: UAB ALBARS yra Microsoft Certified Partner, kurios pagrindinė veikla – novatoriškiausių bei optimaliausių IT infrastruktūros sprendimų kūrimas ir įgyvendinimas siekiant užtikrinti įmonių veiklos aukštą produktyvumą, duomenų saugumą, įvairių produktų ir įrangos integraciją bei beveik neribotą funkcionalumą. Įmonėje dirba didelę patirtį ir techninių žinių bagažą sukaupę IT specialistai (keletas iš jų turi Microsoft Most Valuable Professional (MVP), Microsoft Certified Trainer (MCT) statusus), kurių kompetencijų sričių spektras: nuo dinaminių duomenų centrų/debesų iki aplikacijų kūrimo pagal užsakymą; nuo unifikuotos komunikavimo/bendradarbiavimo koncepcijos diegimo iki hibridinių sprendimų System Center ir Azure pagrindu. Nors mūsų prioritetas – IT sprendimai, pagrįsti Microsoft produktų pagrindu, bet puikia išmanome Open Sources, VMware, Citrix ir kt. Esame jau realizavę daugiau nei 50 projektų Baltijos šalyse, Skandinavijoje, JK, Vokietijoje bei Centrinėje Azijoje, plataus veiklos spektro ir įvairaus dydžio organizacijose (bankuose, viešojo sektoriaus, prekybos, inžinerijos, gamybos, naudingąsias iškasenas eksploatuojančiose įmonėse).

services.title: Mūsų paslaugos
services.description: Tuo ALBARS tikime ellegant ir greitai ji, kad tikrai padeda ir pagerina savo darbą. Mes galime padėti jums išspręsti visas IT klausimus turite ir parengti savo infrastruktūrą fro augimą. Mes esame už šias paslaugas geriausias:

list.title: Stalinis ir prietaisai infrastruktūra
list.description: Stalinis ir prietaisai Mes sukurti valdymo sistemas, įdiegti, konfigūruoti ir vykdyti darbuotojų mokymą. Siūlome projektavimo, įgyvendinimo ir mokymo paslaugas; atnaujinti esamas sistemas; automatizuoti procesus; kartu su IT sistemą.

list.title: Serverio infrastruktūra
list.description: Mes teikiame patikimumą, greitą veikimą ir saugumą serverio infrastruktūros Jūsų įmonei. Mes atlikti informacijos saugumo auditą. Mes siūlome šiuolaikiškus sprendimus, kaip pagerinti greitą veikimą ir atsparumą savo IT infrastruktūrą.

list.title: Cloud and services infrastructure
list.description: We offer expansion and growth of the performance of your IT infrastructure due to cloud technologies. We will help you to determine a common approach that is optimal for your company and integrate the local infrastructure with cloud solutions.

list.title: Application And Productivity Services
list.description: We expertise in creating and deploying modern web applications and services. Unified communication & collaboration; Load balancing; Web servers; Databases.

list.title: IT Trainings
list.description: ALBARS is Certified Learning Partner. Certified Partner status ensures that ALBARS equipment and specialists' qualification meet the global requirements of the Microsoft Company. We have tremendous hands-on experience in the use of Microsoft Solutions - a guarantee that students will receive in-depth technical expertise.

list.title: IT Security
list.description: We will ensure entire information security in your corporate system based on Active Directory rights: Public key infrastructure (PKI); Active Directory Rights Management Services.

trainings.title: Trainings
trainings.description: ALBARS IT team develops and implements the most cutting-edge and effective complex IT infrastructure solutions for organizations of a wide activity range and various sizes all around the world, it develops demo environments to help customers in choosing the most suitable IT solutions that correspond with the company’s needs best. ALBARS IT specialists – trainers of high competence (Microsoft Most Valuable Professional (MVP), Microsoft Certified Trainer (MCT)), who have exceptional technical experience and deep knowledge, may provide colleagues with the most up-to-date theoretical and practical knowledge, which will assist companies to implement the set objectives and to make the most of their technologies on the way to the higher quality and development level.

list.title: Server
list.description: Windiws Server, Exchange Server, Lync, SharePoint, Microsoft Azure

list.name: Jevgenijus Vinochodovas
list.title: Solutions architect, founder
list.bio: Microsoft Certified Trainer and has Microsoft Most Valuable Professional (MVP) Award. More recently he has become a Microsoft Private Cloud Facilitator and Microsoft vTSP. He has several Bachelor Degrees of IT and also graduated from Military Academy where he was awarded with the Lieutenant’s rank.

list.name: Rimantė Šilauskienė
list.title: Head of Communications
list.bio: Advertisement/Marketing Project Manager, Real Estate/Construction Development Coordinator experience. Diplomated specialist of electrical equipment of industry. Master of Psychology (specialize in Cognitive, Management fields). Organizational Climate and Culture Surveys. Personality assessment of employee by using projective and psychometric methods.

list.name: Sergejus Barinovas
list.title: Software engineering architect
list.bio: Sergejus is a Software Architect. He is active community member in Lithuania, Microsoft Most Valuable Professional (MVP), blogger (http://sergejus.blogas.lt) and Lithuanian .NET User Group lead.

list.name: Ekaterina Osipova
list.title: The Business Development Manager
list.bio: Microsoft Certified Professional, web-developer, programmer, social media administrator. Works in the IT industry for nearly a decade and constantly working on improving her IT skills.

list.name: Adas Keserauskas
list.title: IT Manager
list.description: An important part of our critical infrastructure is now in the cloud. We are possibly one of the first companies in Lithuania to move infrastructure and software to the cloud, but given the benefits we won’t be the last for sure.

list.name: Sarunas Legeckas
list.title: COO
list.description: We asked […] ALBARS to find an alternative platform and they suggested Windows Azure. The cloud was an attractive option because we could scale with virtual machines easily and quickly as needed.

list.name: Sarunas Legeckas
list.title: COO
list.description: We were really surprised to discover we could run Linux on Windows Azure. But it’s been a great discovery and one which is enabling us to take our business worldwide with confidence and success.

list.name: UAB 'Kelprojektas'
list.case: Kelprojektas wanted to strengthen its IT infrastructure and moved from an unreliable on-premise solution to a cloud-based infrastructure based around Windows Azure and Office 365 which provides it with great reliability, unbeatable cost savings and enviable flexibility.

list.name: Place I Live
list.case: Place I Live’s business is built on delivering open data that provides information about living conditions and services in major global cities. When it piloted the service it used a local website hosting provider but soon discovered the service wasn’t robust and flexible enough to scale out to many cities. Consequently, it turned to Microsoft Azure which allows it confidently reach around the world with a cloud-based infrastructure that is reliable and flexible, and one that performs powerfully.

list.name: Venipak
list.case: Productivity solutions to improve the efficiency of the company: Office 365 + Windows Azure + Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online.

list.name: Kauno vandenys
list.case: ALBARS recovered UAB “Kauno vandenys” critical data after disaster occurred and helped the organization better understand and move toward a more secure, well-managed IT infrastructure that will help reduce overall IT costs, make better use of IT resources, and make IT a strategic asset for the business, helped eliminate unnecessary cost and complexity, ensured that the business will be always up and running.

contacts.title: We have offices and smart people all around the world. Please contact the closes office to you.
